sentence.Network_en: The failure rate on the bar exam is discouragingly high.
sentence.Network_cn: 律师考试的失败率高得让人气馁.

sentences.sentence: "the failure rate on the bar exam is discouragingly high"

auth_sentence.content: Yet discouragingly large areas of truth seem excluded from his vision.

auth_sentence.content: But the Second Symphony, the choral ode The Music Makers and the symphonic study Falstaff were discouragingly received.

auth_sentence.content: Then they assemble in the forward lounge for a talk on procedure given by three of the discouragingly capable staff members.
